## Import.FsItem.getChildren() method

Gets the children of a [FsItem](./ts-res.import.fsitem.md) if it is a directory.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getChildren(): Result<FsItem[]>;
```
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[FsItem](./ts-res.import.fsitem.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

`Success` containing an array of [FsItem](./ts-res.import.fsitem.md) children on success, or a `Failure` containing an error message if it is not.
